headline: NEW GERMAN BLOWS IN CHAMPAGNE FAIL; Three Attempts to Wrest Moronvilliers Heights from the French Are Repulsed. BRITISH WIN AIR FIGHTS Down Twenty-three Enemy Airplanes, While French Fliers Account for Nine. 23 German Airplanes Downed. CAPTURED 250 FRENCH. Berlin Reports Success on Champagne Front South of Moronvilliers. KAISER VISITED DOUAI. Canadians Hear He Told German Troops Battle Was at End. AMERICAN KILLED AT FRONT. Six Others with Canadians Wounded; One Dies from Wounds.
